brands.name: Bet365
brands.rationale: Highest branded search volume (59K/mo for 'bet365 app'), dominant international brand expanding US presence, superior app technology

brands.name: DraftKings
brands.rationale: 5,300/mo branded searches for 'draftkings app', market leader with FanDuel, innovative parlay features, strong DFS integration

brands.name: theScore BET
brands.rationale: Formerly ESPN BET (rebranded Dec 2025), media-integrated experience, excellent live betting features, newsworthy brand evolution

brands.name: Caesars
brands.rationale: 600/mo branded app searches, established casino brand, strong rewards program integration, competitive odds

brands.rationale: 900/mo branded app searches, strong regional presence, competitive promotions, reliable app performance
